channel.title: Music – 알레프(ALEPH)
channel.description: Recent content in 알레프(ALEPH) on Music

item.title: 알레프(ALEPH) - mirrors
item.description:
Mirrors
They are all around
Dreamers
Why do they disappear
Does real life drags you from this fantasy world
Callings you missed many times
Surely they wouldn’t helped at all
You began to realize
There is a missing part in you
Oh said I many times many times
You will be wandering
Despite everything you have been through
Oh said I many times many times
Can you see the world
It is turning up side down
Can you see it clear
Can you feel it now
still mesmerized by
Dreamer’s solitude
Mirrors fall like dominoes
Break into pieces
No clue
No whatsoever
For the life of you
Oh said I many times many times
You will be wandering
Despite everything you have been through
Oh said I many times many times
Can you see the world
It is turning up side down
What now
This world is a mystery
You should wake
Before the kingdom falls down
Right now
What you doing now
It is meaningless trying in your dream
Oh said I many times many times
You will be wandering
Despite everything you have been through
Oh said I many times too many times
Can you see the world
You are turning up side down
You dream a little dream
Dream a little dream
You dream a little dream
Dream a little dream
Tonight
